name: Homer vs. the 18th Amendment
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Swartzwelder
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: After Bart inadvertently becomes drunk at a St. Patrick's Day celebration, an old prohibition law banning drinking in Springfield is rediscovered and enforced. Desperate to keep alcohol in the city, Homer takes matters into his own hands.
